text.title: Some Fixed Point Theorems for Quadratic Quasicontractive Mappings
text.author: Ovidiu Popescu, Gabriel Stan
text.head: 2. Main Results
text.p:
Before stating the main results, we introduce the following type of quasicontraction.Definition 1.
A mapping of a metric space X into itself is said to be a quadratic quasicontractive if there exists such that
